name: glpi
description: GLPI is a full-featured IT asset and service management platform that includes helpdesk, inventory, documentation, and automation tools. It is widely used in enterprise environments to manage IT assets and service requests.
features: Asset Management: Track hardware, software, and licenses across your entire IT infrastructure.
Helpdesk Ticketing: Manage service requests and incidents with a full-featured ticketing system.
Inventory Automation: Automatically discover and inventory network devices and computers.
Knowledge Base: Build internal documentation and solutions for common IT issues.
Contract Management: Track vendor contracts, warranties, and maintenance agreements.
Project Management: Plan and track IT projects with tasks, milestones, and resource allocation.
Reporting Dashboard: Generate reports on assets, tickets, and IT service metrics.
Plugin Ecosystem: Extend functionality with hundreds of community and commercial plugins.
